name: Delete an installation

previews.name: gambit
previews.description:
**Note:** Uninstalling GitHub Apps using the REST API is currently available for developers to preview. To access the new endpoint during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.17/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.gambit-preview+json

```

previews.name: machine-man
previews.description:
**Note:** To access the API with your GitHub App, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.17/v3/media) in the `Accept` Header for your requests.

`application/vnd.github.machine-man-preview+json`

description:
Uninstalls a GitHub App on a user, organization, or business account.

You must use a [JWT](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.17/apps/building-github-apps/authenticating-with-github-apps/#authenticating-as-a-github-app) to access this endpoint.
